fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Roleblock all players who visit you.
- (Rehearsal) Increase the Attack value of another Band member, then rehearse.
- (Concert) Select a player. You will attack one random visitor.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot roleblock or attack Band members.
- (Rehearsal) You cannot increase it beyond Overkill.
- **Rehearsal Radius:** 3
